plot: A story about change of paradigm and the consequences. Corruption of a child's mind with the glorification of knowledge is a central theme. Once the childish way of thinking is gone, there is no way back.
title: Kiko
plot_es: A story about change of paradigm and the consequences. Corruption of a child's mind with the glorification of knowledge is a central theme. Once the childish way of thinking is gone, there is no way back.
plot_en: A story about change of paradigm and the consequences. Corruption of a child's mind with the glorification of knowledge is a central theme. Once the childish way of thinking is gone, there is no way back.
